name: iSchool Website
desc: The iSchool website includes information about the school. It uses MUI and Semantic-React UI to manage the data, and the Google Maps API to display the data on a map.

name: Find Your Interested
desc: The website is a recommender system. It is built with dynamic JavaScript and stores user's information in localStorage or cookies.

name: Pokemon Random Sketch
desc: This project using p5.js to build a pokemon sketch randomly. Everytime when user refresh the page, the sketch will randomly sketch again.
